name: historical_exchange_rates
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool currency_conversion_and_exchange_rates.
Tool description: Simple reliable API for current and historical foreign exchange (forex) currency rates.
API description: Retrieve historical exchange rate data. Data is available for most currencies all the way back to the year of 1999.

date.description: The date for which to retrieve exchange rate data, formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD'.
